name: Dust Remains (AstroBeef)
description:
INPUT:

WASD - Movement

L. CONTROL - Crouch

LEFT CLICK - Fire/Shoot

R - Swap and Reload

R + R - Fast Swap

R (Hold) - Reload

ESCAPE - Pause

=======================================================

NOTES:

- When the boss's health bar empties out, he'll just freeze. There's no death animation set up yet. So pat yourself on the back when he starts spazzing out.

- To end the game, use ALT+F4
